00020 #ifndef AGG_GAMMA_CTRL_INCLUDED

00029 namespace agg
00030 {
00031     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032     // Class that can be used to create an interactive control to set up 
00033     // gamma arrays.
00034     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035     class gamma_ctrl
00036     {
00037     public:
00038         gamma_ctrl(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2);
00039 
00040         // Set colors
00041         void set_background_color(const color& c)   { m_background_color = c; }
00042         void set_border_color(const color& c)       { m_border_color = c; }
00043         void set_curve_color(const color& c)        { m_curve_color = c; }
00044         void set_grid_color(const color& c)         { m_grid_color = c; }
00045         void set_inactive_pnt_color(const color& c) { m_inactive_pnt_color = c; }
00046         void set_active_pnt_color(const color& c)   { m_active_pnt_color = c; }
00047         void set_text_color(const color& c)         { m_text_color = c; }
00048 
00049         // Set other parameters
00050         void set_border_thickness(double t)        { m_border_thickness = t; calc_spline_box(); }
00051         void set_curve_thickness(double t)         { m_curve_thickness = t; }
00052         void set_grid_thickness(double t)          { m_grid_thickness = t; }
00053         void set_text_thickness(double t)          { m_text_thickness = t; }
00054         void set_text_size(double h, double w=0.0);
00055         void set_point_size(double s)              { m_point_size = s; }
00056 
00057         // Event handlers. Just call them if the respective events
00058         // in your system occure. The functions return true if redrawing
00059         // is required.
00060         bool on_mouse_button_down(double x, double y);
00061         bool on_mouse_button_up(double x, double y);
00062         bool on_mouse_move(double x, double y, bool button_flag);
00063         bool on_arrow_keys(bool left, bool right, bool down, bool up);
00064         void change_active_point();
00065 
00066         // A copy of agg::gamma_spline interface
00067         void  set_values(double kx1, double ky1, double kx2, double ky2);
00068         void  get_values(double* kx1, double* ky1, double* kx2, double* ky2) const;
00069         const unsigned char* get_gamma() const { return m_gamma_spline.get_gamma(); }
00070         double get_y(double x) const { return m_gamma_spline.get_y(x); }
00071         const gamma_spline& get_gamma_spline() const { return m_gamma_spline; }
00072 
00073         // Vertex soutce interface
00074         unsigned     get_num_paths() { return 7; }
00075         const color& get_color(unsigned i) { return *m_colors[i]; } 
00076         void         reset_iterator(unsigned idx);
00077         pathflag_e   next_vertex(double* x, double* y);
00078 
00079     private:
00080         void calc_spline_box();
00081         void calc_points();
00082         void calc_values();
00083 
00084         double m_x1;
00085         double m_y1;
00086         double m_x2;
00087         double m_y2;
00088         
00089         gamma_spline  m_gamma_spline;
00090 
00091         color  m_background_color;
00092         color  m_border_color;
00093         color  m_curve_color;
00094         color  m_grid_color;
00095         color  m_inactive_pnt_color;
00096         color  m_active_pnt_color;
00097         color  m_text_color;
00098         color* m_colors[7];
00099         double m_border_thickness;
00100         double m_curve_thickness;
00101         double m_grid_thickness;
00102         double m_text_thickness;
00103         double m_point_size;
00104         double m_text_height;
00105         double m_text_width;
00106         double m_xc1;
00107         double m_yc1;
00108         double m_xc2;
00109         double m_yc2;
00110         double m_xs1;
00111         double m_ys1;
00112         double m_xs2;
00113         double m_ys2;
00114         double m_xt1;
00115         double m_yt1;
00116         double m_xt2;
00117         double m_yt2;
00118         conv_polyline<gamma_spline> m_curve_poly;
00119         ellipse                     m_ellipse;
00120         gsv_text                    m_text;
00121         conv_polyline<gsv_text>     m_text_poly;
00122         unsigned m_idx;
00123         unsigned m_vertex;
00124         double   m_vx[32];
00125         double   m_vy[32];
00126         double   m_xp1;
00127         double   m_yp1;
00128         double   m_xp2;
00129         double   m_yp2;
00130         bool     m_p1_active;
00131         unsigned m_mouse_point;
00132         double   m_pdx;
00133         double   m_pdy;
00134     };

00141     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00142     // Rendering function
00143     template<class Renderer> 
00144     void render_gamma_ctrl(Renderer* r, gamma_ctrl* c)
00145     {
00146         unsigned i;
00147         polyfill pf;
00148         for(i = 0; i < c->get_num_paths(); i++)
00149         {
00150             r->set_attribute(c->get_color(i));
00151             pf.reset();
00152             make_polygon(&pf, c, i);
00153             render_polygon(r, &pf);
00154         }
00155     }
00156
